title: Ticket #6059: Count prefetch time as part of schedd interaction
description:
Right now, prefetching is "free" communication: time spent in the prefetch loop doesn't count against a schedd's time.

I think this is wrong: in CMS, we've observed a "bad schedd" timing out every one of several prefetch loops. We shouldn't give the unresponsive schedd a free pass just because prefetching is enabled.

We should add time spent prefetching (from when the first prefetch request is sent until the last request finishes, regardless of how many schedds we are processing in parallel) to the time spent negotiating with the schedd.
